item.title: The crimes that "stable, dutiful" Elizabeth hid in plain sight
item.description: Democracy is at an age where it is of the people, and by the people, but certainly not for the people: the ’choices’ we are given to lead our countries are either this lunatic or that lunatic, and despite literally no one liking them once they’re elected, there is nothing we can do to get rid of them except wait for the next lunatic-vs.-lunatic election.

item.title: The crimes that "stable, dutiful" Elizabeth hid in plain sight
item.description: Its about time to say the quiet part out loud: Elizabeth spent seventy years washing her bloodstained hands, and even now after she has passed, they remain unclean.

item.title: Ketanji Brown Jackson is the latest victim of Biden's fruitless optics
item.description: With Jackson, Biden extends his holy mission of diversity beyond the Cabinet; meanwhile, her nomination process has forcibly reopened wounds for Black women across the country.
